verses.verse: Remember <S%H2142><s%> also your Creator <S%H1254><s%> in the days <S%H3117><s%> of your youth, <S%H979><s%> before <S%H5704><s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H3808><s%> the evil <S%H9567><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> come <S%H935><s%> and the years <S%H8141><s%> draw <S%H5060><s%> near <S%H5060><s%> when <S%H834><s%> you will say, <S%H559><s%> "I have <S%H369><s%> no <S%H369><s%> delight <S%H2656><s%> in them";

before <S%H5704><s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H3808><s%> the sun, <S%H8121><s%> the light, <S%H216><s%> the moon, <S%H3394><s%> and the stars <S%H3556><s%> are darkened, <S%H2821><s%> and clouds <S%H5645><s%> return <S%H7725><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the rain; <S%H1653><s%>

in the day <S%H3117><s%> that the watchmen <S%H8104><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> tremble, <S%H2111><s%> and mighty <S%H2428><s%> men <S%H376><s%> stoop, <S%H5791><s%> the grinding <S%H2912><s%> ones stand <S%H988><s%> idle <S%H988><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> they are few, <S%H4591><s%> and those who look <S%H7200><s%> through windows <S%H699><s%> grow <S%H2821><s%> dim; <S%H2821><s%>

and the doors <S%H1817><s%> on the street <S%H7784><s%> are shut <S%H5462><s%> as the sound <S%H6963><s%> of the grinding <S%H2913><s%> mill <S%H2913><s%> is low, <S%H8217><s%> and one will arise <S%H6965><s%> at the sound <S%H6963><s%> of the bird, <S%H6833><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of song <S%H7892><s%> will sing <S%H7817><s%> softly. <S%H7817><s%>

Furthermore, <S%H1571><s%> men are afraid <S%H3372><s%> of a high <S%H1364><s%> place and of terrors <S%H2849><s%> on the road; <S%H1870><s%> the almond <S%H8247><s%> tree <S%H8247><s%> blossoms, <S%H9343><s%> the grasshopper <S%H2284><s%> drags <S%H5445><s%> himself along, and the caperberry <S%H35><s%> is ineffective. <S%H6565><s%> For man <S%H120><s%> goes <S%H1980><s%> to his eternal <S%H5769><s%> home <S%H1004><s%> while mourners <S%H5594><s%> go <S%H5437><s%> about <S%H5437><s%> in the street. <S%H7784><s%>

[Remember Him] before <S%H5704><s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H3808><s%> the silver <S%H3701><s%> cord <S%H9112><s%> is broken <S%H7576><s%> and the golden <S%H2091><s%> bowl <S%H1543><s%> is crushed, <S%H7533><s%> the pitcher <S%H3537><s%> by the well <S%H4002><s%> is shattered <S%H7665><s%> and the wheel <S%H1534><s%> at the cistern <S%H953><s%> is crushed; <S%H7533><s%>

then the dust <S%H6083><s%> will return <S%H7725><s%> to the earth <S%H776><s%> as it was, and the spirit <S%H7307><s%> will return <S%H7725><s%> to God <S%H430><s%> who <S%H834><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> it.
"Vanity <S%H1892><s%> of vanities, <S%H1892><s%>" says <S%H559><s%> the Preacher, <S%H6953><s%> "all <S%H3605><s%> is vanity! <S%H1892><s%>"

In addition <S%H3148><s%> to being <S%H1961><s%> a wise <S%H2450><s%> man, <S%H2450><s%> the Preacher <S%H6953><s%> also <S%H5750><s%> taught <S%H3925><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> knowledge; <S%H1847><s%> and he pondered, <S%H239><s%> searched <S%H2713><s%> out and arranged <S%H8626><s%> many <S%H7235><s%> proverbs. <S%H4912><s%>

The Preacher <S%H6953><s%> sought <S%H1245><s%> to find <S%H4672><s%> delightful <S%H2656><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> and to write <S%H3789><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> of truth <S%H571><s%> correctly. <S%H3476><s%>

The words <S%H1697><s%> of wise <S%H2450><s%> men <S%H2450><s%> are like goads, <S%H9091><s%> and masters <S%H1167><s%> of [these] collections <S%H627><s%> are like well-driven nails; <S%H4548><s%> they are given <S%H5414><s%> by one <S%H259><s%> Shepherd. <S%H7462><s%>

But beyond <S%H3148><s%> this, <S%H1992><s%> my son, <S%H1121><s%> be warned: <S%H2094><s%> the writing <S%H6213><s%> of many <S%H7235><s%> books <S%H5612><s%> is endless, <S%H7093><s%> <S%H369><s%> and excessive <S%H3854><s%> devotion <S%H3854><s%> [to books] is wearying <S%H3024><s%> to the body. <S%H1320><s%>

The conclusion, <S%H5490><s%> <S%H1697><s%> when all <S%H3605><s%> has been heard, <S%H8085><s%> [is: ] fear <S%H3372><s%> God <S%H430><s%> and keep <S%H8104><s%> His commandments, <S%H4687><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> [applies to] every <S%H3605><s%> person. <S%H120><s%>

For God will bring <S%H935><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> act <S%H4639><s%> to judgment, <S%H4941><s%> everything <S%H3605><s%> which is hidden, <S%H5956><s%> whether <S%H518><s%> it is good <S%H2896><s%> or evil. <S%H7451><s%>
